summary: Professional, secure, scalable wholesale pharmaceutical website for Hi-Tech Pharmaceuticals Pvt. Ltd. with public A–Z product catalog, login required only for ordering using Google authentication, cart and wholesale order workflow, customer order history, and a separate secure admin panel for product/price/bonus/image management, plus About and Contact sections.
architectural_notes: Authentication requirement: use Google login for customers; admin uses separate email+password login.
Access model: public product browsing; authentication enforced only for cart checkout/order submission.
Separation of concerns: admin panel must be completely separate from customer/public views.
known_issues: Potential platform constraint: Google/Gmail OAuth login may not be supported on the originally suggested Internet Computer/Internet Identity stack; may require alternative stack or custom OAuth integration.

existing_features.title: Implement customer authentication that allows users to sign in with a Google account and require authentication only when placing an order (public browsing must not require login).
Create a dedicated, separate admin login flow using admin email + password and restrict all admin functionality to authenticated admins only.

Build the public product catalog UI with alphabetical (A–Z) sorting and an A–Z letter filter, showing product name, image, dosage form, packing details, wholesale rate/price, and bonus scheme for each product.
Implement product management in the admin panel: add, edit, delete products; upload/update product photos; set product rate/price; add/update bonus offers; and manage product categories.
Implement a cart and wholesale order/inquiry workflow: authenticated customers can add products to cart, review an order summary, submit an order/inquiry, and view their order history.
Provide an admin-facing order management view that lists incoming orders/inquiries and their details, serving as the primary "notification" mechanism within the app.

Create site pages and layout: header with company name “Hi-Tech Pharmaceuticals Pvt. Ltd.” and navigation (Home | About Us | Products | Contact Us); About Us section content (overview, mission & vision, commitment); Contact page showing email and phone, plus a contact form; footer with © and disclaimer text.
Apply the requested clean, modern hi-tech medical design with a white/blue/light gray color scheme, professional/trustworthy styling, and full responsiveness across the customer site and admin panel.

new_feature_requests.summary: Public product catalog with alphabetical (A–Z) listing and letter filter; each product shows name, image, dosage form, packing details, wholesale rate/price, and bonus scheme
Order workflow with cart; browsing without login but Google login required to place orders; order summary + submit wholesale order/inquiry; customer order history
Separate secure admin panel with dedicated admin login (email + password) to add/edit/delete products, upload/update photos, set rates, and manage bonus offers/categories

Site pages and UI: responsive clean modern medical theme (white/blue/light gray), header nav (Home/About/Products/Contact), About Us content, Contact section with form and optional Google Map, footer with disclaimer

Backend & database for products, images, prices/bonuses, customers, and orders with role-based access (admin/customer) plus admin email order notifications and scalability for future (mobile app, payment gateway, GST invoices)
Customer authentication via Google login (Gmail/Google Authentication)

Backend data model and access control: persist products (including image references), categories, customers, and orders; enforce role-based access so public reads are allowed for products while product/order administration is admin-only and customer order history is customer-only.
